### Impact
SVG sanitizer library before version `0.15.0` did not remove HTML elements wrapped in a CDATA section.
As a result, SVG content embedded in HTML (fetched as `text/html`) was susceptible to cross-site scripting.
Plain SVG files (fetched as `image/svg+xml`) were not affected.

### Patches
This issue is fixed in `0.15.0` and higher.

### Workarounds
There is currently no workaround available without upgrading.

### For more information
If you have any questions or comments about this advisory:
